content: World news - breaking news, video, headlines and opinion | CNN CNN values your feedback 1. How relevant is this ad to you? 2. Did you encounter any technical issues? Video player was slow to load content Video content never loaded Ad froze or did not finish loading Video content did not start after ad Audio on ad was too loud Other issues Ad never loaded Ad prevented/slowed the page from loading Content moved around while ad loaded Ad was repetitive to ads I've seen previously Other issues Cancel Submit Thank You! Your effort and contribution in providing this feedback is much appreciated. Now it‚Äôs sold for nearly $1 million Princess Diana gowns star in ‚Äòlargest‚Äô auction of late royal‚Äôs fashion At $3,000 a night, luxury farm resorts are the next glamorous getaway Weather Show all Leah Millis/Reuters Official overseeing the National Hurricane Center testified to Congress it‚Äôs fully staffed‚Äîit‚Äôs not There‚Äôs a ‚Äòghost hurricane‚Äô in the forecast. It could help predict a real one Canadian wildfire smoke and a dust plume from Africa could collide over the South this week National Weather Service adding around 125 new hires after laying off hundreds Smoke pours into the US as Canada wildfires force province‚Äôs largest evacuation in ‚Äòliving memory‚Äô More of the latest stories Tingshu Wang/Reuters Rare Labubu sells for more than $150,000 at auction Gatorland Global Jamaica‚Äôs ‚Äòcrocodile guardian‚Äô is fighting to save the island‚Äôs feared predators • Video 1:00 X/IndianCoastGuard Video Container ship ablaze off India‚Äôs coast 1:00 Fred Lee/Getty Images World‚Äôs tallest monk? Victor Wembanyama spotted at China‚Äôs Shaolin Temple with shaved head Visual China Group/Getty Images China to make all hospitals offer epidurals to incentivize childbirth • Video 4:00 CNN Video My Drive Mr. Fido 4:00 Alexander Kazakov/AFP/Getty Images Putin promised to make Ukraine pay for its airbase attacks. What does he have left? • Video 1:23 CNN Video Israel intercepts Gaza-bound aid ship, detaining Greta Thunberg and other prominent activists 1:23 Vladyslav Gorai/Facebook Ukrainian opera tenor killed on voluntary mission in Sumy Roman Pilipey/AFP/Getty Images/File Russian forces claim new advance deeper into Ukraine, amid dispute over dead soldiers TASS Russia says it is sending more Ukrainian soldiers‚Äô bodies to border amid spat over prisoner swap • Video 0:42 CNN/Mohammad al Sawalhi Video ‚ÄòThis box won‚Äôt even last me a week‚Äô: Palestinians show CNN their aid boxes 0:42 Something Extra Architecture around the world Show all Murdo MacLeod Lesley Lokko is on a mission to transform architecture, fostering a new generation of ‚Äòmore dynamic thinkers‚Äô He drove a bulldozer at Asia‚Äôs first World Expo. Now, he‚Äôs one of the event‚Äôs star architects Designing the Serpentine Pavilion is an architect‚Äôs dream job.
